relatedRecords.name: Global Azure 2020. u Križevcima
relatedRecords.description: Global Azure 2020. u Križevcima U subotu, 25. travnja 2020. od 9:00 sati, Razvojni centar i tehnološki park u Križevcima postat će jedna od preko 200 lokacija diljem svijeta na kojoj će se održati hrvatska instanca Global Azure-a 2020. Događaj je to posvećen Microsoftovoj cloud computing platformi…

relatedRecords.name: Shift Developer Conference
relatedRecords.description: The biggest Developer Conference in Southeast Europe. This event, Shift 2020 is the seventh and will bring together more than 1300 attendees. During the two conference days, Shift becomes a meeting place for developers in the most beautiful city in the world.
